website_summaries.verdict: This musical crib toy has a simple pull-and-play design that makes a great early introduction to the concept of cause and effect.
pros: Soft, fluffy construction and crinkle ears provide tactile stimulation
Brahms's Cradle Song is activated by a quick tug on the squirrel's tail and continues to play while he shimmies back into his acorn
Loop closure attaches to more than just cribs
cons: Sound quality isn’t the best and some parents felt the music was a bit too soft

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. It was smaller than I expected. The music was very cute as well as the squirrel. I loved how it went in and out of the acorn. My one issue is you pull the squirrel, it plays the song and plays as the squirrel gets pulled back into the acorn. The squirrel had some trouble getting back into the acorn on its own and would kind of lag and I would need to help lift it up for it to go keep paying and go into the acorn. Not a huge issue but babies aren’t necessarily going to know to do that and may be stuck with the squirrel not playing the music :(
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel gets stuck, cutting the music time short
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but too large to be a stroller toy, its half the size of my baby. He loves it, its soft, plays nice music, but the outer shell is too soft and floppy, so when you pull the squirrel out of the tree, the tree collapses enough to prevent the squirrel from returning all the way back up, and cutting the song short. If the squirrel were able to complete the cycle, it would buy you a couple minutes of peace and quite - at least my baby is fascinated. But because the squirrel gets stuck, it's only good for half the time. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Brown

customer_reviews.title: FIRST PULL and it either broke or the batteries died.
customer_reviews.text: Welp, probably a great toy if you buy it from a reputable retailer who hasn't had it sitting on a shelf long enough for the batteries to go dead. I gave it 1/10th of a pull and it kinda made its way back into the acorn, as long as it wasn't touching the fabric and I was guiding it. Gave it a full pull, got 2 notes and then nothing. Aside from that this thing seems pretty great. It appears you have to undo stitching to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Nicepen

customer_reviews.title: not high quality - broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The music is rather tinny - sounds like an old fashioned music box where it's more difficult to get the notes right. Additionally the elastic pull broke within maybe the first 20 pulls so now it doesn't work at all. Still the boy likes looking at the cute squirrel so I'm not going to worry about it. I might see about fixing it myself or I'll just cut off the elastic and make it a squirrel that can be placed into an acorn.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the squirrel down, and the song starts as expected, However, the squirrel just stops ascending at a certain point. I thought it was getting caught in the acorn, but as far as I can tell, the mechanism just doesn't pull hard enough to completely retract the squirrel. This wouldn't be so annoying if this didn't cause the song to end prematurely as well. So basically the toy fails at doing the one thing it's supposed to do. I generally like this brand, but this was an overall garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn (Jennings) Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Musical and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cute squirrel toy for a grandchild-it gets pulled down out of its acorn and plays music all the way back in. It runs for quite a while and is not little, but medium sized to hang. Quality toy!
customer_reviews.author: Farholme Fan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I need to get better at reading descriptions but I assumed based on price this would be the size you strap to a carseat but it is much larger. More football sized. Will be perfect attached to a crib. When you pull the tail it plays music. Great style and quality. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashe

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but...
customer_reviews.text: The toy is actually much bigger than I expected, and really cute. The only problem is that, as I read in other reviews, the squirrels doesn’t go all the way up, because it’s head gets stuck at the base of the acorn. This makes the lullaby stop. From then on I think the squirrel is too heavy for the mechanism to lift it, so you have to help it the rest of the way up. Besides this issue, I think my daughter will enjoy playing with it when she’s a little bit older
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: A Very Cute Baby Gift
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this I thought it would be a great gift for my 8 week old grandson. He loves it! He watches the squirrel and chatters and smiles and moves his arms and legs. It is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: L. Orens

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like a Safe Crib Decoration/Toy ~
customer_reviews.text: Very cute concept - Seems a bit cheap in how it's made, though, so I'm not sure how it will hold up with a baby pulling on it. Music box sound is 'tinny'. But? For the price? For a sweet crib decoration that seems safe for baby? I'm okay with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi ZemontTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $20...do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: It arrived defective. The person I gifted it to pulled it once and it never worked again. The squirrel would not go back into the acorn and the music does not play. WORST GIFT EVER. To make it worse, I can't return it since by the time I got it back from the person I gifted it to, Amazon closed the return window. THANKS FOR NOTHING, MANHATTAN TOY COMPANY and AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: I just feel like it’s to big to be a stroller attachment. We ended up hanging it on the crib for awhile before re-gifting it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Creepy melody
customer_reviews.text: otherwise good toy but the melody plays off sync and comes across as very creepy. We even ordered a second one and it was the same for both.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robinson Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Sound defect
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first. After playing the music a few times, it started sounding like it was playing 2 songs at once and just out of tune. I’m sad because it is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: CrysLib

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a musical squirrel?
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing gift! The whole family loved it and we found everyone using it before it even made it to the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this! Picture looked so cute but the music is completely off key
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Cute Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute product. You pull the squirrel out of the acorn and it plays music. This was a gift for my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Came smushed and won't go all the way up
customer_reviews.text: The music plays great and the object itself is adorable. BUT it came smushed in the mail and as a result the squirrel gets caught half way up EVERY TIME and won't finish playing.
customer_reviews.author: KaSondra Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Cute crib toy, but doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchild in mid December. It rarely plays music or moves back into the acorn. At random times it starts working! The material is soft and stitched nicely, but the Velcro strap at the top of ours is only 1.5” diameter. I’ve bought other baby toys from this company and been pleased. This time disappointed, but kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Baby’s crib toy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute!!! A little big though if you want to use it on a car seat more for in a crib
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: This guy is my baby’s favorite toy but she tends to try to eat the fur on his tail. He’s so great though so we want to keep him around. Sweet little face and song plays well.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cute, just don’t listen to the music!
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable, BUT, the music box sounds haunted (on the sharp side). I wanted this to be my go-to toy for baby, but can’t stand listening to it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cute but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: Cute product, but the squirrel’s head gets caught on the bottom of the acorn and stops. I have to help feed it back up. It only plays for about 10 seconds before catching
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Just too cute! Music is loud enough to hear. The string/ribbon that the squirrel is attached to seems like it could break over time if you yank at it too hard. Overall, extremely pleased and my friend loved it for her new baby. :)
customer_reviews.author: lilady28

customer_reviews.title: Adorable critter
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s adorable and so fun to watch the squirrel go up into the acorn. The only issue I had was the Velcro is a little small so it doesn’t wrap around a thicker crib railing which many of the newer cribs have.
customer_reviews.author: Thia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute, different musical pull toy. It catches the baby's eye and she really seems to enjoy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost right away.
customer_reviews.text: Its fun but sadly the pulling mechanism broke after using about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Music is totally off and seems already broken
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to get our kid this toy but something seem off with the toy. Music is totally off and the alignment of the squirrel to the face hole wrong so it doesn't go back by itself. Will be returning it as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine pull tou
customer_reviews.text: The toy is cute but it sounds like the battery is dying or something.. when I pull it the song drags out slower than I believe it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is much larger than I thought! It is sooooo cute! The music is soft. I love this. I am giving it as a shower gift for a woods themed nursery. It will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Great gift. Bigger than I was expecting and tune is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be much smaller than it is but it is perfect the way it is. Pull the squirrel and it plays a sweet lullabye (you choose from 3 options) and the squirrel makes its way up into the acorn to peep put the hole. I love it, and it's very calming for baby :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scholz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s alot larger than I imagined but it’s still so cute. The squirrel is easy to pull and goes back up in the acorn perfectly. It’s super durable and easily attaches to cribs and car seats.
customer_reviews.author: KaCee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Impulse buy, cute but not practical. Once I got it I regretted buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel pull musical crib toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute musical crib toy! Great seller Quick delivery Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the twinkle twinkle music but this toy keeos breaking. After gong through 3 of them, I've had enough! The first time the notes started going off, second time the little sun got stuck all the time and couldn't find it's way up into the sky/cloud and this last time the string is stuck all the way down and no music plays at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So sweet! Toy is larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: So sweet! Toy is larger than I expected, nice quality and cute. Music sounds a little sickly (out of tune) but I'd still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this crib toy to be very big because of the inexpensive price but I was pleasantly surprised. It is really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! I hung it on my son's jumper and he lives to stare at it and listen, plus it's wicked cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: unexpected and cute
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected and cute. She can't pull it out herself, but she still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it appears, but an excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than it appears in the picture, but my baby loves it! Need something really sturdy to attach it to, in order to pull the squirrel and activate the music. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wheat

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: Delightful Squirrel Pull Musical toy for my grandson's woodland theme nursery. We are very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the woodsy theme. Music is a bit out of tune.
customer_reviews.author: Heidenseek

customer_reviews.title: ... how big it was going to be but it super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize how big it was going to be but it super cute!
customer_reviews.author: romana

customer_reviews.title: Please change the music
customer_reviews.text: The music is disturbing in a flat key. I disposed of it vs giving as a gift .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and works well
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought it would be but it is so cute and works really well. My 4 month old granddaughter loves watching the squirrel come down. Her daddy is a squirrel fan so this gift was a real hit. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: trudy lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last a month. The item stopped working all together and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Scoma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best! My son loves it and it is so cute and soft. It is larger than most pull toys too which is a plus! The shipping was super fast as well. I would recommend buying for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMomma

product_meta.title: Manhattan Toy Lullaby Squirrel Pull Musical Crib and Baby Toy
product_meta.description: Style:Lullaby SquirrelThis adorable Squirrel pull musical nursery toy will certainly gather more compliments than nuts! simply pull down the Squirrel from the Acorn to hear the cradle song by Brahms, and watch him slowly wiggle his way back into the Acorn as the song plays. With a fabric loop for easy attachment to cribs and strollers, baby will never have to be without their favorite musical pull toy. Since 1979, Manhattan Toy has been making award-winning, high quality, educational toys for your baby, toddler or kid. From Infant toys and baby toys to nursery and baby travel toys, our goal is to provide the safest and best toys available. All of our products, from the newest concepts to our time-tested classics, are innovatively designed to inspire imaginative play and are routinely safety tested to pass strict CPSC, ASTM, EN71 and health Canada safety standards.
feature_bullets: Pull the peaking Squirrel by the tail out of the acorn to hear the cradle song by Brahms
Squirrel slowly wiggles back into his acorn home as this classic lullaby plays
Musical baby toy features ultra-soft plush fabrics and crinkle paper ears for tactile exploration
Features fabric hook and loop closuree for attachment to cribs and strollers
Pull musical baby toy suitable for ages 0 months and up, measures 5"L x 5"W x 9"H

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
